LanguageData.RecheckWallsDesc: Recheck all walls connected to this building. Useful for when new walls are added to the system.
LanguageData.FirestormNotReady: Firestorm system is not ready. Please wait:
LanguageData.FirestormNoPower: Not enough power stored in batteries.
LanguageData.NoFirestormWallsSelected: No wall segments selected to start Firestorm.
